mapper.insert: insert into db_orderlog (SID, CORPID, ORDERID, TRADEID, OPERTYPE, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE4, ORDEROPER, DESCR, RESERVE3, RESERVE5) values (#{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderoper,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reserve5,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_orderlog set CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADEID = #{tradeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTYPE = #{opertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDEROPER = #{orderoper,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SID, CORPID, ORDERID, TRADEID, OPERTYPE, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE4, ORDEROPER, DESCR, RESERVE3, RESERVE5 from db_orderlog where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SID, CORPID, ORDERID, TRADEID, OPERTYPE, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE4, ORDEROPER, DESCR, RESERVE3, RESERVE5 from db_orderlog
